2001-3317 (La. 10/25/02)

STATE ex rel. Gordon ALLEN v. STATE of Louisiana. No. 2001-KH-3317. Supreme Court of Louisiana. Oct. 25, 2002.

In re Allen, Gordon-Plaintiff; Applying for Supervisory and/or Remedial Writs, Parish of Jefferson, 24th Judicial District Court Div. A, No. 96-0002; to the Court of Appeal, Fifth Circuit, No. 01-KH-1196.

Denied.
